abstract: T. Boone Pickens wants a court to derail state approval of a water management plan that he claims would knock $10 million off the value of his groundwater rights in the Texas Panhandle, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: T. Boone Pickens wants a court to derail state approval of a water management plan that he claims would knock $10 million off the value of his groundwater rights in the Texas Panhandle, The Associated Press reported.
lead_paragraph: Water’s acting like the new oil. It’s got one wildcatter’s attention anyway.

headline.main: Pickens Wants Texas to Nix Water Plan
